ch.lambdaj.group
Class GroupCondition<T>

java.lang.Object
  ch.lambdaj.group.GroupCondition<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArgumentGroupCondition, StringGroupCondition
public abstract class GroupCondition<T>
extends Object

Defines how a set of items should be grouped

Author:
Mario Fusco

GroupCondition
sort(A sortingArgument)
          Defines how the groups generated by applying this condition should be sorted based on the value assumed on the given argument by the object that is the key for a given group

as

public GroupCondition as(String alias)
Sets an alias for the groups created using this condition

Parameters:
alias - The alias to be set
Returns:
The GroupCondition itself in order to allow a fluent interface

sort

public <A extends Comparable<A>> GroupCondition sort(A sortingArgument)
Defines how the groups generated by applying this condition should be sorted based on the value assumed on the given argument by the object that is the key for a given group

Parameters:
sortingArgument - The argument defined using the Lambda.on(Class) method on which the groups have to be sorted
Returns:
The GroupCondition itself in order to allow a fluent interface
